Str: What's wrong? You're too sensitive, right? Come on, I still need to find Calvin, maybe after this mission, the wise old man will give me something interesting.
These are not beautiful people, they are very hostile, the person you are looking for is probably in danger.
All the more reason to find out what's going on.
Thank you for driving away the enemy, these people seem to be premeditated, originally I foresaw some bad things, was trying to find the wise, but these people besieged here.
Do you know who these people are? What they want.
I'm not sure, but they're supposed to have something to do with foreseeing dark forces. Let's go to the wise man first.
The problem seems to be getting more and more complicated.
Everybody be careful. After what happened last time, the enemy must be on guard.
Trust me, all enemies are a piece of cake.
The wise man is right. The enemy's actions seem premeditated, and after we interrupted them last time, they'll be ready if they return this time.
I also think the wise man has a point.
All right, all right. Whatever you say.
What's your purpose? Why are you attacking here?
No talking, right? Well, then I'm gonna have to force you to talk. Here we go.
Well, it looks like we're having the same problem elsewhere. What are these assholes up to?
I guess we'll have to find out for ourselves what they're up to.
(The Wood element has been extracted, so let's not let them know!)

They attacked the Star and Moon Forest at the same time also made action on Water city, I think the situation is not too optimistic, other cities are estimated to be within their plan, we need to seize the time.
These guys are here. Leave it to me. Let me see what I do with them.
Do not be careless, I do not know whether these people have got the news to know what happened in the Star-moon Forest, if they already know, they will certainly strengthen their defenses.
Hey, where the hell are you guys from, and what do you have to do with those people in Starmoon Forest.
Oh, no, we got caught, hero. You stupid bastard, you can't keep quiet.
Looks like the Starmoon Forest operation has been discovered, and since you're here, we'll have to take care of you.
Well, that's a lot of talk. That's strength.
These guys are tough. I'm lucky I'm smart.
It's not over yet. We still need to go deeper into the Water city, and I don't think this is the number of enemies.
Arya's got a point. Judging from what happened in Starmoon Forest, this isn't the only enemy, so let's hurry.
You were right. These guys are still around.
How did you get in here? We were supposed to have someone on guard. Ha ha ha, it seems that you have some ability to get in here, I think our teammates have been taken care of by you.
I guess you're not stupid. You want to tell me, or I want you to tell me.
Ha ha ha, I advise you to leave, I don't want to hurt you, we have something to get here.
If I'm not mistaken, you're trying to extract the power of the water.
Who are you, when there are not many people on the continent of Elmote who still understand the power of the elements?
These elemental powers are important to the continent of Hermote, and if they are used by evil people, the entire continent of Hermote could be destroyed, including you.

We don't like to destroy, we just need the power here to make the world a better place. Hermote has been quiet for thousands of years, and now people seem to take everything for granted, and people are not yet able to grasp the power of freedom, and freedom eroded by desire will destroy the world.
Noah: Cut the crap and let's have a fight.
Again, I don't want to hurt you, but if you get in the way of what we're doing, I will show you no mercy.
You cannot stop this from happening, and you have no idea what is about to happen.
It seems that this matter is more serious than we expected.
Looks like it's gonna be another fight. I'm ready.
Why do you like fighting so much? Violence doesn't solve problems.
But violence is the most direct and the fastest, and for these people, reasoning is like talking to a bull. Let's beat them down first.
Ha, ha, ha. Noah's right. It's over.
You lose. Call your boss. You're weak.
What am I doing? Why am I here?
What are you pretending to be? You were just being tough.
These guys are really persistent. You can see them here, too.
You have been deceived, and you have brought nothing but destruction to this continent.
We already know what you're up to.
Let's not talk so much, we have to finish the task as soon as possible, there is the next thing to do.
I don't think we're really wrong.
Maybe we can really trust them, and they can really save the world.
We need your help. Join us.
It's a headache. You people are like cockroaches everywhere.
Ha ha ha, you are too weak, so many people couldn't solve our.
That's it, then. Let me finish this.
Looks like we're strong after all!
You're a traitor, Kane, who failed his mission and betrayed his master.
Leanne Marcus join us. He's wrong. There's still something worth saving in this world.
Have you forgotten what you've been through? Only total destruction can make this world better.
Stop talking to them. Beat them down before you reason with them.
Ha, ha, ha. You underestimate us.
If you really want to save the world, you need our power, Marcus, and these men may actually be able to do it.
Turns out you're the ones who've been blocking our plan, and you're here before I even get to you. Just solved the problem.
Oliver, watch out for these people. They're here because they're not weak.
You people talk a lot of shit. Just do it.
What do you think? We're good, aren't we? Join us.
I didn't expect you to come here, go back, I don't want to hurt you, those monsters behind you can't fight.
Now that we've come here, we can't go back. This world cannot be destroyed.
Mira, don't talk to them. We'll drive them back together
I admit you're strong, but you're not strong enough to take on the Nothingness Lords, and you need our help.
Mira, are you sure? The Nothingness Lords are too powerful, and even with us, they're not enough.
You can't stop us. Now that you're here, we'll have to deal with you.

The only way you people can save the world is to destroy it, which is ironic, even if you use destruction to regenerate the world, after thousands of years, if you face the same problem, will you destroy it again? Your solution is not to cure the symptoms.
That's fine, but it's better than letting the world continue to rot.

I don't know what you've been through, but just because you're in darkness doesn't mean the whole world is in darkness, and the world deserves to be saved, even if it's just for a little light in the morning.
You don't understand what we've been through. For us, the world is beyond help.
Go to war. We're in different situations. There's no point in talking.
You have won, and you have the power to change the world, but the world will not always change as you wish.
The world is also yours, maybe the world is really bad, but as long as you try to change, there will always be a corner of the world is illuminated by your light. Join us. We need your strength.
I see you already know about the elemental Force, but you're here.
I have read about this matter in a book, this world has five elements of metal, wood, water, fire and earth, which maintain the basic operation of this world.
I guess I was right, and the real purpose of your people is to destroy the world with the power of the elements.
You know it's no use. The master has gathered the power of nothingness, and now it's too late.
It's too late. You beat me, it doesn't matter.
You're finally here, and you can't stop me. I have powers you can't imagine.
You're the Nothingness Lord, aren't you? Looks like we need to seal you up again.
Ha, ha, ha. Let's try it.
There's no way in this day and age that anyone can beat me, you fuckers.
Haven't you ever heard the saying, "The dike breaks in the nest, even if we are ants, we will eat your ship."

Noah, I need your help. Last night, there was something abnormal in the sky, so I took a divination, but the source of the divination was a void, and I could only see a darkness gradually permeating the whole continent.
We live in a world where there are organizations that keep us safe, and they take care of everything, don't worry.

This time is different, the nothingness will gradually swallow everyone, just like the night quietly falls, when you look out the window, suddenly found that the night has completely covered the earth.
I need you to go to Starmoon Forest and find a man named Calvin, who has the power to see into the future, to get to the bottom of this matter.
What are you talking about? If there's anything I can do for you.
The wise old man sensed something bad, and I needed to find someone.
I also want to go to the star moon forest to collect some herbs, I go with you.
Yeah, well, Alia's been there a few times, so she knows the place a little better.
Just in case, I've got some gear for you guys at Hero camp, make sure you take it before you leave.
Wise old man, we brought back the man you needed.
Well done. Calvin, long time no see. You know what happened.
I was going to ask you, but there was a bit of an accident, thanks to the people you sent.
I don't know much at the moment, just that some people want something from me.

They did not succeed in this operation and are expected to return to the Starmoon Forest again. It seems we shall have to go again, and this time I will go with you, to guard against some unknown danger.
It was the best of times, it was the worst of times.
The people of the Hermoti continent enjoy peace and prosperity, culture is developing, and technology is advancing.

At the same time, an evil force is quietly awakening, "the Nothingness Lord", the Nothingness Lord's power will bring endless destruction and fear, when the Nothingness Lord awakens, will take his dark army to wreak havoc everywhere, the village is destroyed, the forest is polluted, the river becomes black venom. The once quiet world will be plunged into unprecedented chaos.
You must embark on a journey to find all the power to fight the Nothingness Lord, and the future of Hermoti depends on your decision.
The world is at peace again.

The leafy area is known for its tall trees and lush forests, interwoven with tree houses and suspension Bridges, where residents live in the trees and are at one with nature. The fresh air, the birds and flowers make it an ideal place for meditation and relaxation.

In the heart of the Linxi district is a crystal clear stream with extensive meadows and flower gardens on both sides, ideal for picnics and walks. There is also an ecological education center dedicated to the dissemination of environmental knowledge and nature conservation.

The Tidal area has a spectacular coastline and varied tidal scenery. Its sandy beaches and beachfront walks attract countless visitors to enjoy the sun, sand and waves. The Tidal zone also houses the Marine Life Center, which displays a wealth of Marine life.

Haiyun District is famous for its pleasant sea breeze and leisurely pace of life. Fishermen go out to sea every morning and bring back fresh seafood in the evening. The seafood market and beachfront restaurants serving the freshest delicacies attract diners.

The Rock area is known for its huge stones and solid buildings, and its inhabitants are known for their tenacity and hard work. The architecture and carvings here show exquisite stonework skills and attract many tourists to visit.

The buildings in the thick soil area are mainly made of heavy stone and clay, giving a sense of firmness and security. There are rich cultural and historical sites here that show the long history and unique cultural traditions of Shicheng.

The Flame Area is known for its active volcanic activity and hot springs, where visitors can experience the comfort of geothermal hot springs and the thrill of volcanic exploration. The landscape is magnificent and perfect for adventure and adventure lovers.

The Red Light area is full of red rocks and veins, where miners work hard to mine all kinds of precious ores. The unique landscape and mining activities in this area make it a popular location for geologists and tourists.

The district's tall buildings gleam in the sunlight, with the headquarters of business giants and luxury shopping malls. At night, the brilliant area is brightly lit, like the stars, attracting countless tourists to come to sightseeing and shopping.

It is a haven for craftsmen and inventors, and the tinkling of various metals and the roar of flames fill the area. There are the most advanced forging workshop and machinery factory, the products are exported to the four corners.

The Shadow Zone is shrouded in eternal shadow, and the buildings here are mainly black and gray, giving a mysterious and solemn feeling. Its inhabitants are skilled in secret skills and strategies, and many legendary stories have originated here.

The Valley area is located in a deep valley and is shrouded in mist all year round. The environment here is quiet and mysterious, and the residents live a secluded life. The natural landscape here is unique, making it an ideal place for those seeking peace and inspiration.

The Hadal Zone is the deepest part of the Deep, full of unknowns and opportunities for exploration. There are many undiscovered caves and underground rivers, where explorers search for treasures and secrets, but also face numerous challenges and dangers.

Defeat all enemies and find the Prophet
Please make sure you are fully prepared before entering.

Pay attention to the five elements of restraint and strengthening. /n When in a restrained relationship, the restrained party attribute will be reduced. When in the relationship being reinforced, the attributes of the strengthened party will increase. /n

The hero's stats are boosted when there is a hero near the hero's grid that can strengthen him or her, and when the skill target is the restrained one. /n Hero stats are reduced when the goal of the skill is to restrain the hero.
Gold restrains wood, wood restrains earth, earth restrains water, water restrains fire, fire restrains gold.
Gold strengthens water, water strengthens wood, wood strengthens fire, fire strengthens earth, earth strengthens gold.
Choose a hero based on the enemy lineup.
Before the battle, be prepared at Hero Camp.
You can choose the right equipment for the hero at the forge.

Long press the hero to replace the hero
